wargaye wagema thawath aushadha kihipayak dennata puluwan ..ee ekkama obata roga thaththwaya pilibanda saha sayana pilibanda satahan kala kad pathak labewi ..hondin mathaka thiya ganna ‚Äúme kad eka parissam karaganna‚Äú , oba yana ena hama thanakadima obe pasumbiye mehi pitapathak thiya ganna eka watinawa , ee wagema nisi kalata welawata sayanayata yanna amathaka karanna epa , mokada me aushadha mathrawa warin wara wenas karannata wenawa ..ee ekkama ee aushadha walin yam athuru aabadha athi wennata puluwan nisath nisi kalata waidya adhikshanaya awashyamayi , ee nisa ‚Äúbeheth ganna nisa , walippuwa hadune na‚Äú kiyala sayanayata nogihin inna , nathnam beheth nawathwanna yanna epa ...wiwahaka kanthawak nam , oba me prathikaraya atharathura daruwek pathanawa nam mulinma obe waidyawaraya samanga me gana sakachcha karannama oona , nathnam idiriye thawath awadanam ek karagaththa wenna puluwan ..

sunil wisini, 2013 ape‡∑äral 22 lankawe wyaja wammu amarikawa idiripath kala boru manawa ayithiwasikam yojanawata sahaya dethi nawa sama samaja pakshaya (nasasapa) dakshinanshika eksath jathika pakshaya (ejapa) samaga ekathuwi eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalayedi sammatha kerunu sha‡∑äri lankawe manawa himikam ullanghanaya pilibanda yojanawa ka‡∑äriyathmaka karana lesa janadhipathi rajapakshagen illa sitiyi.

eyath nathi holman thibena bawata wadi prawanathawayakin pawasannata hethuwannata puluwan.ee ekkama api samadeyakatama widyanukula padanamak dennata yamedi, enam bhauthika widyathmakawa me sambandhayen ho wenayam yaksha dewa yanthara manthara wage dewal gana balannata yanakota holman kiya deyak naha kiyala tharka godanagannath puluwan.

pasugiya wasare pawathi tharagawaliye shurathawaya dinagath ‚Äòdaka dayinamayits‚Äô kandayama niyojanaya kala kumar sangakkara mewara da ema kandayamata krida karana athara mewara tharagawaliye di wanindu hasaranga siya palamu bangladesha primiyar lig tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wanu atha.

dan obata therenawa athi api kochchara aasawen kshanika nudls kawath eewa harima lesiyen piliyela karanna puluwan wunath eewage thiyana bhayanaka prathipala athi wishalayi kiyala.
